item.title: Wednesday 12-Feb-2026
item.description: Clear and cold. Temperature: 8-16°C. Humidity: 55%. Wind: NW 4 m/s. No precipitation expected.

item.title: Thursday 13-Feb-2026

item.title: Friday 14-Feb-2026
item.description: Mostly sunny and pleasant. Temperature: 12-20°C. Humidity: 48%. Wind: SW 2 m/s. No precipitation expected.
